review.sentence: The authors make use of the theory of functional gradient, based on optimal transport, to develop a method that can promote the entropy of the generator distribution without directly estimating the entropy itself.
Theoretical results are provided as well as necessary experiments to support their technique's outperformance in some data sets.
I found that this is an interesting paper, both original ideal and numerical results.

rebuttal.sentence: Thank you very much for the comment.
We believe that functional gradient based methods have much room to explore, and it is our hope that many aspects of GANs can be analyzed using this philosophy.

metadata.title: DISTRIBUTIONAL CONCAVITY REGULARIZATION FOR GANS
metadata.rating: 8: Top 50% of accepted papers, clear accept
metadata.confidence: 1: The reviewer's evaluation is an educated guess
